title: Elemental Storm
description: Secrets are like our past. They always come back to screw up our future.  As the French Quarter drags into the Summer heat, Elemental Witch Samantha Hawthorne makes plans for her future, which includes getting through her imposed stint as a Cleric and pinning down a date for her wedding. All plans disappear when her Air Elemental makes a rash decision that tips the balance of power out of Sam's favor.  Will Sam and her friends be able to mend her shattered power while being investigated for the murder of a local mambo, a churning storm, the spirit of a cursed ring and the appearance of her fianc√©'s ex, whose power is even greater than his own?  This is book 6 in The Eldritch Files Series.
author: Phaedra Weldon
